Metadata.defaultDescription: Software Engineer building web applications with React, Next.js, TypeScript. Also experienced in Node.js, Python, and Go.

HomePage.title: Hi, I'm Dmitry Chekashov!
HomePage.subtitle: developer
HomePage.description: I develop beautiful interfaces and high-performance systems

AboutPage.title: About me
AboutPage.description: Hello, visitor of my portfolio site! My name is Dmitry Chekashov. I'm a software engineer with 10 years of experience in web development.
AboutPage.careerDescriptionOne: In 2016, I became passionate about programming when I transferred from my first year of construction college to the "Programming in Computer Systems" program. While studying, I started my career as a markup developer at a local web studio, and after graduation and moving to Moscow, I transitioned into frontend development with React.
AboutPage.careerDescriptionTwo: After several years working with interfaces, I discovered backend development. For the first six months, I studied PHP and worked on integrations, but then I switched to Python. Since then, I've been building robust server-side solutions with Django and FastAPI for about four years.
AboutPage.careerDescriptionThree: Today, I enjoy solving web-related problems of any complexity — from sophisticated interfaces to distributed systems and integrating machine learning models. My journey through different layers of development gives me a holistic view of projects and helps me choose the best tools for each task.
AboutPage.hobbiesDescriptionOne: In my free time, I go to the gym, read technical literature, and work on my own projects. I also enjoy classical literature — my favorite author is Friedrich Maria Remarque. I study foreign languages: English (B2 level) and German (A2). I'm passionate about documentaries and films about outstanding people. My all-time favorite movies are "Oppenheimer" and "The Man Who Knew Infinity".
